title: The No Jumper Show Ep. 38
description:
3:02 Adam shaved his beard 4:26 Housephone should get a philly beard 4:48 Adam didn't bring the Dashiki 5:53 Adam was in Africa in 2014 7:40 Transition 7:42 Adam explains why Dame Dash dissed him this past weekend 10:00 Vlad is the one who brought up Dame Dash in the first place during the interview 10:27 Adam explains why he walked away from doing podcast with Dame and what he meant in the first place when he brought Kanye 11:04 Adam breaks down what he meant by "Black people want..." 12:39 Housephone chimes in about Dame and Kanye 15:20 "It's obvious that Dame was trying to create a narrative that wasn't even there" 16:54 Waka Flocka Flame agrees with Adam 17:01 Housephone praises Waka Flocka Flame for being an Otep 17:29 What does Otep means? 18:21 Housephone finds the meaning of Otep 19:13 Adam reiterates why he didn't want to do the podcast anymore 20:00 Adam shares the convo he had with Vlad about toxic people and how Benzino wanted to go hard about Eminem 21:13 Adam sums up why Dame is the way he is and is surrounded by yes people 22:50 Quibi 24:10 Family channel and raising kids 24:58 Young Chop also chimed in on the Dame diss towards Adam 25:52 Young Chop reposted a clip from No Jumper 26:13 Housephone digs up a comment from someone who got it in with Vell 27:22 Housephone reads a comment from a hater fan who calls out Vell 28:05 Adam finally introduced Vell to AD 31:37 Housephone should be the new Uncle Murda 33:15 Fashion Nova 34:30 When Adam shaves his head gets terrible comments about it 36:00 Men dye their beard 36:30 What's up with Diddy's beard!? 41:10 Cam girl got tested for Covid to get a peace of mind 46:55 Adam hope he doesn't raise a kid to become mean or petty or a bully 49:58 The Covid test is free 51:30 Adam recommends to watch Unorthodox on Netflix 53:58 Coronavirus attire enhances stereotypes 57:54 Bhad Bhabie compares growing up in the hood to being in the jungle 1:01:40 Blackfishing and Asianfishing is a real thing 1:05:15 Iyanna Mayweather's Mugshot and girl acting way cuter online than they actually are 1:09:15 Tom Brady kisses his kids on the mouth? 1:10:24 Adam has a confession about Ayleks Onlyfans 1:12:42 Celina Powel's boyfriend trying to finesse OnlyFans girls 1:14:19 Adam's grandmother asked about Clinton scandal 1:24:07 No Jumper show being consistent 1:26:38 No Jumper Snapchat Show is boomin! 1:27:19 Vitaly latest pranks gone terribly wrong 1:31:40 Mike and Logan Paul are not friends anymore? 1:34:33 Camgirl and Housephone almost got into a fight once 1:45:08 Happy belated Easter 1:47:13 What the hosts do to get some fresh air during this trying times 1:48:41 6ix9ine is back social media and came at Tory Lanez 1:53:53 $950 to get a phone call with Chyna 1:54:45 Poop on Trippie Redd livestream 1:55:40 Adam doesnt tune in to anybody's IG live 1:56:31 Can you do the Toosie Slide? 1:57:28 Do you have any faves on TikTok? 1:58:59 Megan Thee Stallion TikTok 1:59:58 Let's talk about female rappers shoved down our throats 2:00:55 RIP Chynna and Mac P Dawg FOLLOW US ON SNAPCHAT FOR THE LATEST NEWS & UPDATES https://www.snapchat.com/discover/No_Jumper/4874336901 FOLLOW OUR NEW SPOTIFY PLAYLIST! https://open.spotify.com/playlist/529mn7of2HBKdLfrAMUzcK?si=rWVBWCuWSXeh0TFYb2P-dQ CHECK OUT OUR ONLINE STORE!!! http://www.nojumper.com/ SUBSCRIBE for new interviews (and more) weekly: http://bit.ly/nastymondayz Follow us on Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/nojumper iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/no-jumper/id1001659715?mt=2 Follow us on Social Media: https://www.snapchat.com/discover/No_Jumper/4874336901 http://www.twitter.com/nojumper http://www.instagram.com/nojumper https://www.facebook.com/No-Jumper-198283650194402/ http://www.reddit.com/r/nojumper JOIN THE DISCORD: https://discord.gg/Q3XPfBm Follow Adam22: http://www.twitter.com/adam22 http://www.instagram.com/adam22 and adam22hoe on Snapchat
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
